title: Decision Logging Application
description: A decision logging application that allows users to document and track their decisions over time, providing insights into decision-making patterns.
process: The project started with a user research phase to understand the needs of potential users. Wireframes were created in Figma, followed by development using React and Node.js. The application was built with a focus on user experience and data visualization.

title: Nathan Portfolio
description: A modern portfolio website showcasing a developer's work with a sleek dark theme and interactive elements.
process: The project began with wireframing in Figma to design a user-friendly layout. Next.js was chosen for its SSR capabilities, paired with Tailwind CSS for rapid styling. Framer Motion was used for animations. Iterative testing ensured cross-device compatibility and performance optimization.
features: Responsive design optimized for all devices
Dynamic animations for enhanced user engagement
Fast loading times with Next.js optimization

title: StyleLoom Ecommerce
description: An ecommerce platform with a user-friendly interface, secure payment integration, and robust product management.
process: The development process involved setting up a headless commerce architecture using React and Node.js. Stripe was integrated for payments, and a custom CMS was built for product management. Extensive user testing ensured a seamless shopping experience.

title: NexGen Agency
description: A professional agency website showcasing creative services with stunning visuals and client engagement tools.
process: Designed with a focus on visual storytelling, the project used Next.js for performance and GSAP for animations. Client feedback was incorporated through multiple iterations to ensure brand alignment.

title: DevCraft Portfolio
description: A developer portfolio highlighting technical expertise with a clean and modern design.
process: Built using React for component-based architecture and Tailwind CSS for styling. Vercel was used for deployment, with a focus on simplicity and performance. A blog section was added using a static site generator.

title: Currentvandi Business
description: A business-oriented website designed to promote services and drive customer engagement.
process: Developed using Next.js and TypeScript for type safety. Tailwind CSS ensured consistent styling, and analytics were integrated to track user behavior. SEO optimization was a key focus to drive organic traffic.
